name: Frog Memories
description:
Frog Memories is a short platformer with a time-loop mechanic. Every interaction you have in the level will be rewind and replayed, many old version of your avatar meeting as you go.

This game was made for the OneGameAMounth game jam.
Shertigan : Sound and Level Design
Sóll : Music Assistant
Ypsilon : Mechanics and Gameplay Programming
Wampy : Art Direction ang Graphic Design
